title: Beware The Zeits Of March 3/15: NBA, Lauren Boebert, Ides of March, Sunshine Protection Act, Hershel Walker, Bob Saget
itunes:title: Beware The Zeits Of March 3/15: NBA, Lauren Boebert, Ides of March, Sunshine Protection Act, Hershel Walker, Bob Saget
description:
In this edition of Beware The Zeits Of March, Jack and Miles discuss NBA news, the mother of a "Lieutenant Corporal" that "reached out" to Lauren Boebert, people using the Ides of March to troll Putin, the Sunshine Protection Act, Hershel Walker's senate run, and Bob Saget's autopsy results.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
